Interface Url¶

You can replace localhost to <adam pc device ip>, and open url in other device.

name

url

description

exception

http://localhost:9002

provides interface for collect exception

adam

http://localhost:9003

provides interface for control adam

center

http://localhost:9000

provides interface for create order

audio

http://localhost:9004

provides interface for playing music and speaking

coffee

http://localhost:9001

provides interface for make coffee formula

Clouffee
